title: Border Town Blues
description: Dalton's on the run with a gal, and a gun!What begins as a search for missing D.E.A agents, turns into a race against time, through the Sonoran Desert. Jimmy Dalton & Jamie Duggan uncover a plot to unleash a terrible Biological weapon. Suicide bombers loaded with viral death are on their way to unleash hell, only Dalton & Jamie stand in their way.This is the explosive sequel to Homecoming Blues, hard hitting and action packed.
author: Andrew Scorah
